channel.title: Jan Capek on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Bosminer
item.description: Challenges of developing Bosminer from scratch in Rust https://braiins-os.org/ https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1171331418716278785 notes from slides: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ETKx8qfml2GOn_CBXhe9IZzjSv9VnXLGYfQb3nD3N4w/edit?usp=sharing Introduction Good morning everyone. My task is to talk about the challenges we faced while we were implementing a replacement for the cgminer software. We’re doing it in rust. Essentially, I would like to cover a little bit of the history and to give some credit to ck for his hard work. cgminer cgminer used to be a CPU miner that has been functionally removed a long time ago.
